languages.text: "Тебе не дано понять этого, ксенос. Познание врага — путь к его уничтожению. И если для того, чтобы предотвратить неисчислимые будущие беды, я должен свершить одну... таков мой долг перед Золотым Троном".

"You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."
languages.original_text: "Тебе не дано понять этого, ксенос. Познание врага — путь к его уничтожению. И если для того, чтобы предотвратить неисчислимые будущие беды, я должен свершить одну... таков мой долг перед Золотым Троном".

traits.locale_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これを理解できないのだろう、異種族よ。敵を知ることは、そいつらを撃破するための近道だ。将来降りかかる無数の災厄を避けるためなら、我は自ら手をくださなくてはならない…それが、黄金の玉座に仕える我の聖務なのだ」
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: 「これを理解できないのだろう、異種族よ。敵を知ることは、そいつらを撃破するための近道だ。将来降りかかる無数の災厄を避けるためなら、我は自ら手をくださなくてはならない…それが、黄金の玉座に仕える我の聖務なのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你不会明白的，异形。知己知彼，百战不殆。如果由我亲手酿成的灾祸，可以避免未来发生的无数灾祸……为了黄金王座，我责无旁贷。”
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: “你不会明白的，异形。知己知彼，百战不殆。如果由我亲手酿成的灾祸，可以避免未来发生的无数灾祸……为了黄金王座，我责无旁贷。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas comprendre, xénos. Connaître son ennemi ouvre la voie vers son anéantissement. Si je dois perpétrer un crime pour éviter d'innombrables calamités à venir... tel est mon devoir envers le Trône d'Or. »
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas comprendre, xénos. Connaître son ennemi ouvre la voie vers son anéantissement. Si je dois perpétrer un crime pour éviter d'innombrables calamités à venir... tel est mon devoir envers le Trône d'Or. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No lo entiendes, xenos. Para destruir al enemigo, primero hay que conocerlo. Si, para prevenir calamidades futuras, he de cometer una... tal es mi deber para con el Trono Dorado».
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: «No lo entiendes, xenos. Para destruir al enemigo, primero hay que conocerlo. Si, para prevenir calamidades futuras, he de cometer una... tal es mi deber para con el Trono Dorado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr nicht verstehen, Xenos. Seinen Feind zu kennen, ist der Weg zu seiner Vernichtung. Wenn ich selbst ein Unglück herbeiführen muss, um zahllose Katastrophen in der Zukunft zu verhindern ... dann ist das meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Goldenen Thron."
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr nicht verstehen das, Xenos. Seinen Feind zu kennen, ist der Weg zu seiner Vernichtung. Wenn ich selbst ein Unglück herbeiführen muss, um zahllose Katastrophen in der Zukunft zu verhindern ... dann ist das meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Goldenen Thron."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bir zeno, bunu idrak edemez. Düşmanı tanımak, onu yok etmeye giden yolu açar. Gelecekte yaşanacak sayısız felaketi önlemek için şu an bir felaketi tetiklemem gerekiyorsa yaparım. Altın Taht'ın bana verdiği vazife budur."
languages.original_text: "You cannot understand this, xenos. Knowing one's enemy is the path toward destroying them. If, in order to prevent countless future calamities, I must perpetrate one of my own... such is my duty to the Golden Throne."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zeno, bunu idrak edemez. Düşmanı tanımak, onu yok etmeye giden yolu açar. Gelecekte yaşanacak sayısız felaketi önlemek için şu an bir felaketi tetiklemem gerekiyorsa yaparım. Altın Taht'ın bana verdiği vazife budur."
